vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PERSONAL_BANK.Collect (0x01f8c4e3fa3edeb29e514cba738d87ce8c091d3f.sol#41-53):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x01f8c4e3fa3edeb29e514cba738d87ce8c091d3f.sol#47-51)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (0x01f8c4e3fa3edeb29e514cba738d87ce8c091d3f.sol#49)
